original_text:
then they would have swallowed us up alive,
    when their anger was kindled against us;
korean_text: 그 때에 그들의 노여움이 우리에게 맹렬하여 우리를 산채로 삼켰을 것이며

sentences.original_text: then they would have swallowed us up alive
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그들이 우리를 산 채로 삼켜 버렸을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: when their anger was kindled against us
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 분노가 우리를 향해 타올랐을 때
